doc.previous: The control system may allow full or partial automation of flight such as an autopilot a wing leveler or a flight management system An unmanned aircraft has no pilot but is controlled remotely or via means such as gyroscopes or other forms of autonomous control
doc.after: On manned types instruments provide information to the pilots including flight engines navigation communications and other aircraft systems that may be installed  The six basic instruments sometimes referred to as the six pack include 29
